name: rxdb-test-minimal
description: A minmal project that should work, so we can test if the dependencies are ok
author: pubkey

scripts.travis: npm run clear && npm i --silent && ls ../../node_modules && npm start
scripts.start: rm -rf ./db && mkdir -p db && npm run preinstall && node index.js
scripts.clear: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && (cd ../../ && rm -rf node_modules )
scripts.preinstall:peers: (cd ../../ && npm i babel-runtime && npm i rxjs)
scripts.preinstall: npm run preinstall:rmlock && npm run preinstall:peers
